attributes.action: order a full and comprehensive review of the manner in which the NHS treats individuals with thyroid-related diseases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The number of people suffering from undiagnosed thyroid conditions continues to rise in the UK, but unlike other counties the NHS refuses to make diagnoses on anything other than unreliable blood tests. Many thousands are suffering unnecessarily, and it is time that ministers realised that treating an underlying thyroid condition will save the NHS billions of pounds by preventing many other serious 
related conditions arising.
